00008 #include <openrave/openrave.h>
00009 #include <openrave/plugin.h>
00010 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00011 
00012 using namespace std;
00013 using namespace OpenRAVE;
00014 
00015 class MyModule : public ModuleBase
00016 {
00017 public:
00018     MyModule(EnvironmentBasePtr penv) : ModuleBase(penv)
00019     {
00020         __description = "A very simple plugin.";
00021         RegisterCommand("numbodies",boost::bind(&MyModule::NumBodies,this,_1,_2),"returns bodies");
00022         RegisterCommand("load",boost::bind(&MyModule::Load, this,_1,_2),"loads a given file");
00023     }
00024     virtual ~MyModule() {
00025     }
00026 
00027     void Destroy() {
00028         RAVELOG_INFO("module unloaded from environment\n");
00029     }
00030 
00031     int main(const string& cmd)
00032     {
00033         RAVELOG_INFO("module initialized cmd; %s\n", cmd.c_str());
00034         return 0;
00035     }
00036 
00037     bool NumBodies(ostream& sout, istream& sinput)
00038     {
00039         vector<KinBodyPtr> vbodies;
00040         GetEnv()->GetBodies(vbodies);
00041         sout << vbodies.size();     // publish the results
00042         return true;
00043     }
00044 
00045     bool Load(ostream& sout, istream& sinput)
00046     {
00047         string filename;
00048         sinput >> filename;
00049         bool bSuccess = GetEnv()->Load(filename.c_str());     // load the file
00050         return bSuccess;
00051     }
00052 };
00053 
00054 InterfaceBasePtr CreateInterfaceValidated(InterfaceType type, const std::string& interfacename, std::istream& sinput, EnvironmentBasePtr penv)
00055 {
00056     if((type == PT_Module)&&(interfacename == "mymodule")) {
00057         return InterfaceBasePtr(new MyModule(penv));
00058     }
00059     return InterfaceBasePtr();
00060 }
00061 
00062 void GetPluginAttributesValidated(PLUGININFO& info)
00063 {
00064     info.interfacenames[PT_Module].push_back("MyModule");
00065 }
00066 
00067 OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_API void DestroyPlugin()
00068 {
00069     RAVELOG_INFO("destroying plugin\n");
00070 }
